name: Sunburned Hand of the Man
description: '''Sunburned Hand of the Man''' are an [[experimental rock]] band from [[Boston, Massachusetts]]. They are a loose collective known for their frequent line up changes and large discography released on a variety of labels including [[Eclipse Records]], [[Thurston Moore|Thurston Moore's]] [[Ecstatic Peace!]], Three Lobed Recordings, and their own ''Manhand'' label.
